text:
Some1 will be pissed at me but -
#DrFauci, u recently said u don't want to embarrass dt.
I watched u on CNN last night, adroitly side-stepping a full-throated NO re #Chloroquine. Do u think a reticence to contradict him does harm?
I ask bcs people are dying from his stupidity. https://t.co/FqO9cy5vk2
